Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The user wants a list of 20 open-ended thought-provoking questions that delve deeper into the rationale behind the process flows potential improvements risk management decision-making stakeholder communication and performance measurement The process is a smartphone supply chain from market research to distribution and sales forecasting They explicitly request not to provide any SQL queries just list the questions

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We need to think about open-ended questions that can be used to guide analysis process improvement risk mitigation etc So ask Why is market research positioned at start What are the criteria for selecting component suppliers How are lead times accounted What are risk mitigation strategies for component supply How does parallel gateway for components ensure resilience What is the decision criteria for the exclusive gateway after quality checks How is rework vs scrap decided What metrics are used to evaluate assembly performance How does packaging and labeling adapt to regional regulations How does shipping method air vs sea impact cost and carbon footprint What are the trade-offs in customs clearance How are distribution centers coordinated How is inventory monitored How is sales forecast integrated with procurement How does feedback loop adjust orders How do we handle demand volatility How does the process incorporate sustainability How do we ensure stakeholder communication across the supply chain How does the process incorporate digital twins or IoT for tracking How do we handle regulatory compliance

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The process includes many potential risks geopolitical Taiwan Japan Korea logistics quality demand etc We could ask about the role of data analytics AI and blockchain in improving transparency Also ask about governance risk thresholds and performance metrics lead time fill rate cost carbon

Name: Validation - PE
Text: We must output only a list of questions not provide any SQL So final answer a numbered list of 20 questions open-ended covering the aspects Ensure we include all aspects rationale improvements risk management decision-making stakeholder communication performance measurement Provide thorough but not too long

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: We can also ask about the parallel gateway join after distribution tasks Ask about the integration of e-commerce vs retail Ask about direct shipments for VIP Ask about balancing cost vs speed Ask about real-time visibility Make sure to not repeat similar questions and ensure each question is distinct Ill generate 20 such questions Now ensure we obey Do not provide any SQL queries just list the questions Potentially incorporate open-ended phrasing What would be the impact of How could be improved What criteria are used to decide How do we ensure What mechanisms exist to etc

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Lets propose 1 What strategic objectives drive the decision to place market research as the initial activity in the smartphone supply chain 2 How do you determine the optimal balance between cost lead time and risk when selecting component suppliers across Taiwan Japan South Korea Germany and the USA etc Make sure to incorporate all topics Lets draft 20 Will produce a list numbered 1-20 each a separate line No extra commentary Proceed
